scripts.watch: echo 'フロントエンドは docker compose up -d で起動済みです。変更は自動で反映されます！' && docker compose logs -f frontend
scripts.build: docker compose exec frontend npm run build
scripts.test:frontend: docker compose run --rm frontend npm test
scripts.test:backend: docker compose run --rm backend php artisan test
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.build:frontend: echo 'Validating Next.js build...' && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.prepush:check: npm run precommit:typecheck && npm run build:frontend
scripts.postmerge:setup: echo 'Post-Merge Setup: Installing dependencies...' && npm install && cd frontend && npm install
